AggOO::GradientAdapter

AggOO::GradientAdapter Class Reference

#include <AggOOStyleHandlerGradient.h>

Inheritance diagram for AggOO::GradientAdapter:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class for the gradient adapter

Remarks:
The gradient styles were basically wrappers for the AGG versions. The adapters are going to be reimplementations. The reason is that the adapters require the gradient function as a template parameter, but because we are doing this to avoid templates, that is a bit tricky... Instead, since there are only 2 adapters, the code will be copied, and they will take a pointer to the function, of type GradientFunc*.
